segments.text: I notice the open cabinet with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing high on that shaky two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's standing ready to catch or receive one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring quietly behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's playful, but the risk makes me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over at the sink, water is everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just stands there, unaware and neutral-faced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably ruined from the splashes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess is just gross to watch build up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden looks pristine in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR
